system.description: Shatter creates a loud, ringing noise that breaks brittle, nonmagical objects; sunders a single solid, nonmagical object; or damages a crystalline creature. Used as an area attack, shatter destroys nonmagical objects of crystal, glass, ceramic, or porcelain within a 5-foot radius. Objects weighing more than 1 pound per your level are not affected. Alternatively, you can target a single solid object (regardless of composition) weighing up to 10 pounds per caster level. Targeted against a crystalline creature, shatter deals 1d6 points of sonic damage per caster level (maximum 10d6), Fortitude save for half.

components.materialDescription: A chip of mica (arcane); divine focus (divine)

system.target: 5-ft.-radius spread; or one solid object or one crystalline creature
